7. What is encapsulation in OOP?
option_1: It is a way of combining various data members and member functions that operate on those data members into a single unit

question: 8. What is an abstraction in object-oriented programming?

question: 9. The copy constructors can be used to ________

option_4: Copy an object so that it can be passed to a class
